content.html: The FSU wants to see Liz Truss's government commit to creating an enforcement mechanism to ensure children aren't politically indoctrinated at school. The 'Drag Queen Story Hour' movement illustrates exactly why that mechanism is now so urgently required. linkedin.com/pulse/drag-que…
content.value:
The FSU wants to see Liz Truss's government commit to creating an enforcement mechanism to ensure children aren't politically indoctrinated at school. The 'Drag Queen Story Hour' movement illustrates exactly why that mechanism is now so urgently required.

linkedin.com/pulse/drag-que…

content.html: When you try to silence the voices of marginalised people, how can you claim to be defenders of free speech? The "ideology of free speech" only wants to extend those rights to those already welding power. We already have a name for this.
content.value:
When you try to silence the voices of marginalised people, how can you claim to be defenders of free speech?

The "ideology of free speech" only wants to extend those rights to those already welding power.

We already have a name for this.
